EmailTemplate.name: Email Project.ELT Order Coding Sheet
EmailTemplate.subject: Your ELT Order {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
ELT Order – We Need Your Coding Sheet
Hello {!Case.Contact_Name_c},
We're glad to hear from you! We’ve received your ELT order {!Case.CaseNumber}, and are anxious to get right to work on it.
But before we can start, we need your help. We need just a bit more information to complete your request. Your ELT coding sheet.
Submitting your ELT coding sheet is super easy with the new online form. Just log into the MyAerospace portal <http://www.myaerospace.com/> and select the software & database tab.
Accessing the new form does require a MyAerospace portal ID. Don’t have an ID? No problem! Just go to the portal <http://myaerospace.com/> and sign up as a new user and then request access to the ASDS <https://ads.honeywell.com/> web page.
We’ve decommissioned the old email method. So starting now, you’ll need to begin using this new form.
Need more information <https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/ELT%20User%20Guide.pdf?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRomrfCcI63Em2iQPJWpsrB0B/DC18kX3RUoKr+ffkz6htBZF5s8TM3DV1ZBXqFI+EEBS7I=> or help in updating your ELT? Call us at +1-602-436-6737, option 5, or click on DSA@Honeywell.com <http://goaero.honeywell.com/o027Z00FQ0060Q000XIG0q0>.
Thank you. We appreciate your business! Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support
ORIGINAL CORRESPONDENCE: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.Description} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
